descriptionHtml:
Location : West of Whiterun (Wilderness) Check pictures for map location Fast travel enabled 

Class Recommendation : Hunter/Plainsman/Forsworn/Warrior 

Welcome to my new mod Hunters Brook,this is another cage living space mod made for a hunter 
or plainsman type char.Set on a platform with two cages as living spaces,the upper has a simple 
bedoll in one cage and the lower a storage chest and dresser.The platform has a table & chair 
with some static decoration about,included in the mod is a cooking area with two strongboxs 
with leveled items in them.Also there are barrels for storage and food.This mod works well with 
my other cage mod (Caged But Free) as a second living space or storage base for hunting. 
Set on a small brook with a jetty/dock and plenty to hunt for in the wilderness. 

Update V1.4
***************
Added Crafting tables (Back of cages)
Added Blacksmiths Jetty
Added Travel back to brook when you arrive at locations
Fixed Boat landing areas on hunting grounds so your safe to stalk prey
Fixed Boat landing locations

Features 
************ 
Fast travel boat to : Solitude,Morthal & Dawnstar 
Fast travel boat on jetty to 3 different locations of game hunting 
Location 1 : Ice flow island is a small area with ice wolves & Horkers 
Location 2 : Death Vally is a vally of Sabre cats & Bears 
Location 3 : Mammoth Plain is a heard of wild mammoth\'s on marshland 
Hunters tower (Back of living space) With stash of arrows & Supplies 
Extra game to hunt (Deer) In all directions 
Brook Hunter\'s Boat Fast travel to morthal,Solitude & Dawnstar (Use Boat on Jetty) 
Cooking Area 
Storage chest & Dresser 
Food barrels 
Strong box\'s with leveled items 
Set of hunters clothes (Enchanted) 
Archery Tower & Supplies
Good hunting surroundings 

(Please check Pictures) 

Credits 
********* 
Many thanks to Darkfox127 for his help on the fast travel boat scripting 
Top man as usual check his links out. 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DarkFox127Productions 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DarkFox127Pro

Website: http://www.darkfox127productions.weebly.com 

Thanks for looking...
author: EvilMrPumpkinsNexus
